mapper.update: update RetBillMt set ybflag='Y' where ybflag='N' and billcode=#{billcode}
mapper.select: select a.billcode , case when 0 > b.paidinamt then '106' else '107' end as invChgType, '1087165' as medListCodg, '一次性使用组织闭合夹(WS)' as medListName, -- '506724'as medinsListCodg, -- '闰中密友冰爽激情装' as medinsListName, f.goodscode as medinsListCodg, f.goodsname as medinsListName, case when c.IsPres='Y' then '1' else '0' end as rxFlag, ABS(b.num) as cnt, b.traprice as pric, CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120) as invChgTime from RetBillMt a WITH(NOLOCK) join RetGoodsDt b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.billno=b.billno join goodsattr c WITH(NOLOCK) on c.goodsid=b.goodsid join goodsdoc f WITH(NOLOCK) on f.goodsid=b.goodsid where a.ybflag='N'
